title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression 'row[0]' is set
description: When a filter is set to 'row[0] equals to 0' or just return null result set.
OB: Bug 110566: The first result record is returned when previewing the data set with an invalid filter expression 'row[0] equals to '
EB: The expected result is that the filter expression 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data is fetched and cannot be used as a valid filter expression.
SR:
Bug 110566: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to '
2. Click on the Preview tab.
